text:
[Verse]
Morning light it breaks
In my room it sneaks
Eyes awaken fresh
Dreams they still speak

[Verse 2]
Birds are singing loud
In the sky so proud
Feet on wooden floor
New day I explore

[Chorus]
Sunrise whispers low
Daylight starts to show
Hearts begin to flow
With the morning glow

[Verse 3]
Coffee brews its song
Warmth it leads me on
To the world outside
Where the moments glide

[Verse 4]
Nature's gentle kiss
In the air
Such bliss
Beneath the sky so wide
In love's arms I hide

[Chorus]
Sunrise whispers low
Daylight starts to show
Hearts begin to flow
With the morning glow
title: Sunrise Whispers
